attributes.action: Launch primary legislation to protect the public NHS from profit led providers.
attributes.additional_details:
There is no escaping the fact that despite his protestations our “leader” is clearly intent on the radical reform of OUR service into some sort of clone of the failed system in the USA famed for its ability to enrich service providers and corporate “insurance” companies whilst losing contact with service users.

There is clear evidence from the USA,its health systems ability to bankrupt people.

The destruction of the NHS has already started it can’t be allowed to continue or people will DIE.
attributes.background:
The NHS was established on very clear principles of free at the point of delivery.

More and more companies are being bought in, with profit for shareholders as their duty before service users.
The public value their current service and don’t want it damaged

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
